Text:
Thx for the up and for your comments on my torrents.

Sadly Suprbay is down for a while but Mods are working on it ./

@ PIRATES of ThePirateBay this is for yuh all :

Suprbay.org had been taken down by FBI and Co so if yuh need to report : wrong/fakes/infected /password protected and child porn related torrents yuh can do so this way :

download mIRC https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6790525/

then instal/crack it .

Open mIRC , go to COMMANDS ---> Join channel ---> and add this channel you want to join : #thepiratebay.org then yuh can talk to TPB/SuprBay MODS and ask help what so ever .

As people are NOT always with their eyes fixed on this channel you MIGHT have to wait a few minutes before someone answers to yuh so be patient . AND DO NOT HESITATE to POP AROUND to say hi !
